dc:title: On Pilgrimage - May 1954
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Paints a picture of Catholic Worker community life--the house, work, prayer, needs, and volunteers. Lists the summer programs for Peter Maurin Farm and Maryfarm. Describes her Holy Week observance.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 668 1954-05-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
